body_html:
Hi,

From the path, /anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages, it looks like you're trying to launch that bazel build from the tensorflow pip-installation.

(Almost) none of the examples, and none of the BUILD files are included in the pip installation.

For that bazel command to work you need to launch it from a git clone of the tensorflow repository. That should work.

Good luck.

(Almost) none of the examples, and none of the BUILD files are included in the pip installation.
For that bazel command to work you need to launch it from a git clone of the tensorflow repository. That should work.
Good luck.
body:
Hi, 

From the path, /anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages, it looks like you're trying to launch that `bazel build` from the tensorflow pip-installation. 

(Almost) none of the examples, and none of the BUILD files are included in the pip installation.

For that bazel command to work you need to launch it from a git clone of the tensorflow repository. That should work.

Good luck.
